title: "We aren't able to create a lobby right now. Please Exit the client and re-open it to try again."
body:
Well I've done that multiple times. But I've been having log in issues with the warning "Can't connect to login queue."
I've only been able to get into game once, and there was connection issues. I've been able to use everything else that requires internet completely fine, and no issues with League for the entire year so far. What's going on?

replies.body:
I found a fix that worked for me.

Saw this fix posted by -KawaiiAutumnDesu (NA)-

Here is his fix

""" I was experiencing the same issue and i think i found a possible fix (at least it worked on my part) i went into the league_client folder (Riot Game> League of Legends > RADS > Projects > league_client > releases) i saw that there is 2 folders 0.0.0.74 and 0.0.0.75 i assume the issue is when u launch the client it runs the league client inside 0.0.0.74 >deploy folder which is an older version.
in this case and when i ran the league client in 0.0.0.75 > deploy folder ( Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\projects\league_client\releases\0.0.0.75\deploy\LeagueClient.exe ) it scans some files (takes few min) then no restored to older installation message appeared and afterward i logged in and play button works """




Copied{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
Been having the exact same problem.{{item:3070}}

There might be something going on with some of your network settings that is preventing your client from getting a solid connection to our servers. Let's try going through the steps in our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) and see how that helps. Hit me back up if you still can't get into any games after those steps!

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=eYs9s7Am,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-05-22T22:56:41.505+0000)
>
> There might be something going on with some of your network settings that is preventing your client from getting a solid connection to our servers. Let's try going through the steps in our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) and see how that helps. Hit me back up if you still can't get into any games after those steps!

Nearly everything on that page I had already done on my own to no avail.

No worries, sometimes we need to take a few troubleshooting steps to narrow down what the main problem is. Let's go ahead and get you some one on one help with our tech guys. They can dig a lot deeper into your system to see what's happening in your [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)!

I opened a ticket at 6 40 PM (for my time zone; for reference it's 5 40 PM as i'm typing this) and I have not gotten a response. Hextech Repair Tool isn't working, whenever I reach out to Riot i'm being sent to the same links that don't help whatsoever. My frustration with this issue is beginning to grow a fair amount.
